attributes.action: Make Joomla! the standard content management system for all Government websites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Joomla! is an open source content management system. Its adoption by the UK Government would reduce costs through licencing, reduce costs through standardised training and give a boost to the hundreds of independent web design firms across the country.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
